page.title: 08The Farming Year (cont.).
page.content: {July}Commence early potato harvest and also harvest of winter barley. {August}Harvest of wheat, peas, oats and spring barley. Bale and haul straw. Plant new grass. {September}Prepare ground and plant winter corn. Complete late harvest. {October}Spray crops and grass for all diseases. {November}Prepare yards and move in the stock in readiness for winter. {December}General maintainance work on machinery, field boundaries and buildings. This is a picture of what happens on the farms in our area, but obviously there are some fluctations and overlapping of certain tasks.
